name: Kati The Astronaut
description:
Help Kati the Astronaut save the universes!

Join Kati in this highly engaging 2.5D adventure game that has keyboard and game controller support.

If you enjoy adventure, mystery, the Sci-Fi genre, and 80s style music, get ready for the PLANETARY EXPERIENCE of a LIFETIME.

Kati explores the unexplored depths of space to find the dangerous creatures that are invading her planet.



Along the way she encounters encouraging friends...



As well as potential adversaries...



Are you ready to save the universes!?

We hope to see you there!
